dimensions:
A. Warp: 212cm (47 3/4in.).Weft: 77.5cm (30 1/2in.) B. Warp: 110.5cm (43 1/2in.). Weft: 30cm. 11 3/4in.)
Pattern: Height of repeat: 101.5cm (40in.)
title: L'homme bienfaisant
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation.
description: Series of scenes illustrating the story of the 1780 opera, "Seigneur bienfaisant" by Floquet (1748-1785) after a book by Rochon de Chabannes (1730-1800). The principal scenes include; a man rushing to rescue a child from a burning house, an enormous wine press and a feast with a decorated raised dias. In red on white.
name: Textile
